name: Trodo Sup.
description:
Nice little add on to the classical Trodo.

Approach

If you walk up from Quartino on the west side of the Valley, aim for the path that goes further into the valley at the intersection at a height of 875m. From there, find a way down through the forest to reach the riverbed at a height of 780m (hasn't been tested yet)

If you come from Monte Ceneri, just go to the start of the normal Trodo, but then walk up the river, take the tributary river uphill that is on the eastern side. That way you'll get around a small hill and can do the second interesting section of Trodo Sup.

Descent

It is possible to do it from the very top of the Valley, but only gets interesting from 780m above sea level on. There are two nice parts with both 4 Waterfalls in it, in between there is 15 minutes of walking. At the end, it's just 5 minutes of walking before reaching the start of Trodo Inf.

There are some nice little jumps, with big enough pools to try tricks.

Exit

Red tape
